content:
[Zn2(py-TTF-py)2(BDC)2]·2DMF·H2O (1). Compound 1 was prepared using the previously reported method. Analytically pure reactants Zn­(ClO4)2·6H2O (0.01 mmol, 3.8 mg), py-TTF-py (0.01 mmol, 3.6 mg), and H2BDC (0.02 mmol, 1.7 mg) and 0.8 mL of mixed solvent of CH3CN–DMF (1:1 in volume) were used and heated for 2 days. The yield of the red lamellar crystals of 1 is 60.2% (4.0 mg) based on py-TTF-py. Anal. Calcd for C54H44N6O11S8Zn2 (MW 1340.30): C, 48.39; H, 3.31; N, 6.27%. Found: C, 48.21; H, 3.26; N, 6.23%. IR data (cm–1): 3054 (w), 2997 (w), 1672 (m), 1605 (s), 1588 (m), 1550 (m), 1502 (m), 1388 (s), 1253 (w), 1221 (w), 1092 (m), 1074 (m), 1016 (m), 941 (m), 885 (w), 867 (w), 829 (s), 745 (s), 690 (m), 663 (m), 626 (m).

[Zn2(py-TTF-py) (BDC)2]·DMF·2H2O (2). Compound 2 was prepared using a similar method to that of 1 except that 1.6 mL of mixed solvent of CH3CN–DMF (dimethylformamide) (5:3 in volume) was used and heated for 3 days. The yield of the black rod crystals of 2 is 44.0% (3.8 mg). Anal. Calcd for C35H29N3O11S4Zn2 (MW 926.7): C, 45.36; H, 3.15; N, 4.53%. Found: C, 45.57; H, 3.03; N, 4.59%. IR data (cm–1): 3069 (w), 2980 (w), 1633 (w), 1609 (s), 1550 (m), 1530 (m), 1502 (m), 1431 (w), 1380 (s), 1221 (w), 1067 (m), 1029 (m), 1014 (m), 936 (m), 881 (w), 816 (s), 780 (m), 747 (s), 689 (m), 658 (m), 633 (m).
clean_text:
Experimental Section

Preparation of Compounds

[Zn2(py-TTF-py)2(BDC)2]⋅2DMF⋅H2O (1). Compound 1 was prepared using the previously reported method. Analytically pure reactants Zn(ClO4)2⋅6H2O (0.01 mmol, 3.8 mg), py-TTF-py (0.01 mmol, 3.6 mg), and H2BDC (0.02 mmol, 1.7 mg) and 0.8 mL of mixed solvent of CH3CN-DMF (1:1 in volume) were used and heated for 2 days. The yield of the red lamellar crystals of 1 is 60.2% (4.0 mg) based on py-TTF-py. Anal. Calcd for C54H44N6O11S8Zn2 (MW 1340.30): C, 48.39; H, 3.31; N, 6.27%. Found: C, 48.21; H, 3.26; N, 6.23%. IR data (cm-1): 3054 (w), 2997 (w), 1672 (m), 1605 (s), 1588 (m), 1550 (m), 1502 (m), 1388 (s), 1253 (w), 1221 (w), 1092 (m), 1074 (m), 1016 (m), 941 (m), 885 (w), 867 (w), 829 (s), 745 (s), 690 (m), 663 (m), 626 (m).

[Zn2(py-TTF-py) (BDC)2]⋅DMF⋅2H2O (2). Compound 2 was prepared using a similar method to that of 1 except that 1.6 mL of mixed solvent of CH3CN-DMF (dimethylformamide) (5:3 in volume) was used and heated for 3 days. The yield of the black rod crystals of 2 is 44.0% (3.8 mg). Anal. Calcd for C35H29N3O11S4Zn2 (MW 926.7): C, 45.36; H, 3.15; N, 4.53%. Found: C, 45.57; H, 3.03; N, 4.59%. IR data (cm-1): 3069 (w), 2980 (w), 1633 (w), 1609 (s), 1550 (m), 1530 (m), 1502 (m), 1431 (w), 1380 (s), 1221 (w), 1067 (m), 1029 (m), 1014 (m), 936 (m), 881 (w), 816 (s), 780 (m), 747 (s), 689 (m), 658 (m), 633 (m).
